root.name: Art of Murder: FBI Confidential
root.description: SummaryThird person point and click.Inventory and logic puzzles.One timed puzzle in which your character can die.Ample saves, and you can save almost anywhere.An interesting mystery with mediocre dialogue.Scenery graphics are well done.There are quite a few instances of expletives, and at least one scene that contains gore. The game is rated 16 .Subtitles are provided.PC System RequirementsOS: Windows 98/ME/2000/XPProcessor: Pentium 3 @ 500 MHzMemory: 128 MBHard Drive: 1 GB FreeVideo Memory: 32 MB (DirectX 8.1 Compatible)Sound Card: DirectX 8.1 Compatible

similar_games.game: Art of Murder: Hunt for the Puppeteer
